name: N.E.M.A
description:
Final project submission for UCI GDIM 31. 

A 5-level platformer about a small robot exploring an abandoned factory. Turn the level ON or OFF to reach the exit. 

A group project by Eric Park, Tim Kashani, and Nathan More.

Controls:

-A and D/Left and right arrows to move left and right

-W/Up arrow to jump

-Left/Right Shift to plug in/out (near an electrical outlet)

-ESC to pause/resume the game

Note: Make sure cookies are enabled in order for game to save.
